metadata.title: Can the encoder interfaces of the RZ/T2L be used with 2 channels?

sections.content:
Question:
Can the encoder interfaces of the RZ/T2L be used with 2 channels?
Answer:
Yes. It is possible to use 2 channels by combining each of the EnDat2.2, BiSS®-C, HIPERFACE DSL, FA-CODER®, and A-formatTM encoders.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2L
